title: ‘Bardo, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths’ Review: It’s a Stressful Afterlife
description: In Alejandro G. Iñárritu’s sprawling, intensely personal new film, a prominent journalist grapples with work, family, metaphysics and the paradoxes of Mexican history.
dc:creator: A.O. Scott
category: Bardo, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths (Movie)
media:description: Daniel Giménez Cacho in “Bardo.” He plays Silverio, a character who bears a resemblance to the film’s director, Alejandro G. Iñárritu.
